name: The Usher Foundation IV: The Vast
name_original: The Usher Foundation IV: The Vast
description:
A fan game for Rusty Quill's The Magnus Archives podcast.

You're falling in love; you just wish she didn't have such strange hobbies. 

Full-screen button is on the bottom right. The Magnus Archives is my favorite podcast, so I thought it would be cool to make a short fan game or two. Also a good excuse to explore more form stuff with Twine! This one is very narrative heavy.
